mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(C.AHDATE,9,2) AS DAY, OLD_MILEAGE, NEW_MILEAGE, (NEW_MILEAGE-OLD_MILEAGE) AS CNTMILEAGE FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.AH_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') AS AHDATE, A.OLD_MILEAGE FROM ADMINHISTORY A, (SELECT MIN(NUM) AS MINNUM, TO_CHAR(AH_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') FROM ADMINHISTORY WHERE U_ID ='admin' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(AH_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd')) B WHERE A.NUM = B.MINNUM) C JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.AH_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') AS AHDATE, A.NEW_MILEAGE FROM ADMINHISTORY A, (SELECT MAX(NUM) AS MAXNUM, TO_CHAR(AH_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') FROM ADMINHISTORY WHERE U_ID ='admin' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(AH_DATE,'yyyy/mm/dd')) B WHERE A.NUM = B.MAXNUM) D ON C.AHDATE = D.AHDATE
